interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces))
Review Date: 2021/04/18
Store: Eye Love
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'}
Review Text: I like the ingredients, not super in love with the scent, but it's faint and doesn't linger, so no problem really. This worked up a good lather, not the best, but better than others with a washcloth; the lather didn't disappear either so I didn't need to keep going back to the soap. It's a nice size, larger than others I've tried, and seems like it will last at least a week, probably longer. Non-daily use it could last much longer. As far as moisturizing, I can at least say it didn't dry me out, which is a plus.
Review Title: Faint scent doesn't linger, good lather.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
pine
{'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'}
These are fun colors. I love that each bottle has the color at the top of the cap. So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality.
Love the colors, and that each bottle has the color on the top of the cap.
Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use
Anzuo
{'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'}
These are fun colors; I'd say more New Years Eve party than Xmas. I like that it comes with stickers to mark the top of the caps, but I wish each bottle had the color at the top of the cap already, since it can take some time for the polish to dry. I guess you could write it down? So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality.
Love the colors, more New Years Eve party than Xmas. Would have preferred color already on cap.
Organic Sweet Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut Oil Bundle for Hair and Skin, 100% Pure and Natural, Hexane-Free, Moisturizing, For Healthy Skin, Silky Hair, Multiuse Body Oil, 16 fl. Oz X 2
Shiny Leaf
{'Brand': 'Shiny Leaf', 'Scent': 'Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '32.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.62 x 5.04 x 2.48 inches; 2.23 Pounds', 'UPC': '781584950669'}
As another reviewer said, in much better detail so I'll keep my review brief, the coconut oil being refined does nothing for skincare. I assume the other is in the same boat, despite being unrefined. Which is a shame, since that is what I got them for. Oh well, partly my fault I guess for not reading the fine print.
Wish I'd seen "refined" before selecting.
8 PCS 40ML Mini Spray Bottles, FANDAMEI Fine Mist Plastic Spray Bottles, Empty Refillable Clear Atomizer for Cleaning, Travel, Essential Oils, Perfume, Makeup Liquids. Travel Size, Pink & Blue

Excellent travel size, sturdy enough to withstand travel. Good price. The two colors make it a little easier for organization.
Sturdy, compact spray bottles.

As far as moisturizing, I can at least say it didn't dry me out, which is a plus.

profile:
**User Preference Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: Continues to favor gel nail polish sets with vibrant colors for special occasions while actively exploring hair and skin products. The recent purchase of activated charcoal soap reflects a growing interest in organic and natural products, aligning with their quality-focused approach.

- **Aesthetic Values**: Values practicality and effective design in beauty items, as demonstrated by appreciation for thoughtful product details like sustainable packaging. Their recent experiences with beauty tools support an ongoing desire for organized and functional aesthetic solutions.

- **Quality Awareness**: Maintains a strong emphasis on product quality and effectiveness, evidenced by careful consideration of ingredients in recent skincare purchases. Satisfaction with the longevity and performance of products indicates a preference for reliable and well-rated items.

- **Conscious Choices**: Continues to prioritize non-toxic, cruelty-free, and organic options, integrating ethical considerations seamlessly into beauty and skincare purchases. The interest in brands that uphold these values is likely to remain a key aspect of their shopping behavior.

- **Engagement Style**: Demonstrates loyalty to trusted brands while also displaying a growing keen eye for product specifications and reviews. This trend reflects a well-rounded approach to purchasing, balancing quality, usability, and ethical considerations.

Overall, the user reinforces their inclination towards practical, aesthetically pleasing, and ethically responsible beauty items, with a developing focus on natural ingredients and holistic care solutions.
